fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / KIM WAKEUP
fields.Description: If you succeeded the final Authority check to warn Kim.

fields.Title: You: ""This is the end and I am its trump..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the end and I am its trumpeter, Kim. The quicker we get it done the better."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need, officer. You wanted thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need, officer. You wanted things to go South outside -- that's okay, we all do from time to time. They haven't, though. Yet."
fields.Alternate1: "No need to take it back, lieutenant-yefreitor. You wanted things to go South outside -- that's okay, we all do from time to time. They haven't, though. Yet."

fields.Title: You: "Swallow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Swallow...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe they are simply taking their..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe they are simply taking their time and will attack soon? I don't know."

fields.Title: You: ""Really?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Your balance is *way* off. You feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your balance is *way* off. You feel like you're about to fall over on that thing...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What is?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know..." He rubs his neck...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know..." He rubs his neck. "That's been there for years."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""Solving crimes is hard.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Solving crimes is hard."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He sounds surprisingly weary."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sounds surprisingly weary.

fields.Title: You: ""That's right. Let's give up. Time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right. Let's give up. Time to start drinking."

fields.Title: You: ""The... Wild Pines representative?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The... Wild Pines representative?"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Also, it's just close enough to end..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also, it's just close enough to endure the walk.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know."

fields.Title: You: ""The tie made me do it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The tie made me do it."

fields.Title: You: ""I did all I could there.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did all I could there."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *ouch* time yet. You just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes," he replies. "The joke wasn't funny any more. I took it off."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh yes," he nods. "She left 20 min..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yes," he nods. "She left 20 minutes prior to the tribunal showing up. I asked Mr. Garte."

fields.Title: Logic: "The lieutenant did mention doing mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant did mention doing more ballistics...

fields.Title: You: ""How bad am I hurt?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How bad am I hurt?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "You're a real killer, Harry."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're a real killer, Harry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer -- and this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's face it, officer -- and this is both of our fault..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone *a little* better. Six people are dead."
fields.Alternate1: "Let's face it, officer -- and this is both of our fault..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone *a little* better. Seven people are dead."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's part of a detective's task ch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's part of a detective's task chain. You can do it too."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure they're worried about you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure they're worried about you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know."

fields.Title: You: ""My... disco days are done.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "My... disco days are done."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't reply -- jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't reply -- just looks at you teetering on your feet.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your disco days should have been d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Your disco days should have been done quite a while back, officer."
fields.Alternate1: "Your *disco days* should've been *done* quite a while back, lieutenant-yefreitor."

fields.Title: You: ""Who did it then, Kim? Who killed t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who did it then, Kim? Who killed the hanged man?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think your *incred..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I think your *incredibly dangerous* theory on Titus Hardie was wrong. More than six people saw Titus downstairs that night."

fields.Title: You: ""They were on the roof. I did not....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They were on the roof. I did not... I did  not catch them. Fucking butterfingers..."

fields.Title: You: ""I can't believe they're fucking us..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't believe they're fucking useless!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "By the way, the lieutenant does not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: By the way, the lieutenant does not actually believe you will be spiritually reimbursed for letting her escape. You just have to live with it.

fields.Title: You: ""Is it... war today?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it... war today?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Two days. In and out -- you've bee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Two days. In and out -- you've been up enough to take drouamine and curse. And drink water."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Rhetorical flare. He does not actua..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rhetorical flare. He does not actually welcome the return of the whores.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a killer...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a killer..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Titus, Fat Angus, and Theo charged..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus, Fat Angus, and Theo charged. Angus and Theo did not make it. They both died before they made it to intensive care. Titus survives. So do Alain and the musician, I forget his name..."
fields.Alternate1: "Titus, Fat Angus, and Theo charged. Angus and Theo died before they made it to intensive care, Titus died in the hospital. Yesterday. Alain and the young musician, I forget his name... They're all that's left."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And Elizabeth too -- Elizabeth Bea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And Elizabeth too -- Elizabeth Beaufort was her name. The gardener."

fields.Title: You: ""The tie made me do it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The tie made me do it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? We tried to take th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened? We tried to take the diplomatic route and hoped they wouldn't attack first. They did. The major gave the command."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Three: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Three: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Theo -- he was just too old for combat."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Through tears and blood and stitche..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Through tears and blood and stitches tearing it *should* be possible.

fields.Title: You: ""Has anyone from my station been to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Has anyone from my station been to see me?"

fields.Title: You: ""Good. I don't need them.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. I don't need them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly I think our investigation..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly I think our investigation has not produced a single credible suspect." His voice is calm, matter-of-factly.

fields.Title: You: ""There's still a... 28% possibility..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's still a... 28% possibility the shot came from a distance."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He arches his brow -- the ceiling f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He arches his brow -- the ceiling fan patiently spins overhead.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "A smoke most likely."
fields.Dialogue Text: A smoke most likely.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "A man and a woman sit in the front..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man and a woman sit in the front seat of an armoured motor carriage. The woman is driving, the man lights a cigarette. Jean Vicquemare is his name, the asphalt vanishes under the wheels of the machine. Ahead, harbour cranes rise to the sky...

fields.Title: You: "Nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nod.

fields.Title: You: ""What did you say... sunrise...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did you say... sunrise..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we may have held it off --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think we may have held it off -- for now." He unzips his bomber jacket. "Barely."

fields.Title: You: ""I seriously want this... social or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I seriously want this... social order to collapse now."

fields.Title: You: ""Then what?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then what?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He did not expect you both to survi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He did not expect you both to survive once you stepped between those two armies.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He sounds a *tiny bit* sorry he did..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sounds a *tiny bit* sorry he did not find it before you got hit.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We won't get to him anymore. The g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We won't get to him anymore. The good news is -- he's not coming here either. I did some damage."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer..." he says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's face it, officer..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. You could've *not* missed with the bomb. If you already threw it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The bruising in your shoulder is n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The bruising in your shoulder is negligible. The armour took the brunt of the fire."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. You'll need to be... whateve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. You'll need to be... whatever that is."

fields.Title: You: ""If they're so worried about me whe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If they're so worried about me where are they?"

fields.Title: You: ""You don't... know?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't... know?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the theory y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I think the theory you presented -- it's someone else, outside our circle of suspects -- was right. It'd better be. Everyone within the circle is either dead or gone."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." There's a short pause. "Are y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." There's a short pause. "Are you ready to limp?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, Kim. Every piece of garbage in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, Kim. Every piece of garbage in this city *is* connected to the case."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's a little pause -- he says n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a little pause -- he says nothing as well.

fields.Title: You: ""*Something*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Something*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." He hums -- thinking about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." He hums -- thinking about something else.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "A smoke most likely."
fields.Dialogue Text: A smoke most likely.

fields.Title: Logic: "That does make (some) sense."
fields.Dialogue Text: That does make (some) sense.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not *ouch* time yet. You just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not *ouch* time yet. You just got a *drouamine* pill an hour ago. Wait until it wears off."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The whores, yes. That's good to he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The whores, yes. That's good to hear."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I killed her." The lieutenant take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I killed her." The lieutenant takes a cigarette from his coat pocket and lights it. A bitter smell fills the room. "And that's what happened."
fields.Sequence: PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, StartSmoking); PlayAnimation(Kim Cigarette, StartSmoking);
fields.Alternate1: "I was not able to kill him -- as I should have. Krenel took him..." The lieutenant takes a cigarette from his coat pocket and lights it. A bitter smell fills the room. "A stray bullet killed de Paule, though. And that's what happened."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. She bled out before Evrart's s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. She bled out before Evrart's surgeon could help her. Evrart sent his personal doctor but..." He shakes his head. "A costly loss for the Union. She was being trained for leadership."

fields.Title: You: ""It's a total shit show, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a total shit show, Kim."

fields.Title: Volition: "If it's possible, then by pure will..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If it's possible, then by pure willpower alone. You are going to have to become... a psycholocomotor.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's a pause. "I'm sure they're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a pause. "I'm sure they're worried about you."

fields.Title: You: ""It's simple, we have to locate *co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's simple, we have to locate *communism*. Communism killed him."

fields.Title: You: ""The fucking *May bells*, Kim, the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fucking *May bells*, Kim, the flowers."

fields.Title: You: ""Solving crimes is super easy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Solving crimes is super easy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Every piece of garbage in the city..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Every piece of garbage in the city is not connected to the case. You don't have to catch *everything*."

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing."

fields.Title: Drama: "He may have some idea -- but he's n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He may have some idea -- but he's not gonna get into it with you.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Can you? You're pretty sure you can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can you? You're pretty sure you can't.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: ""Back to that shithole," he says."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back to that shithole," he says.

fields.Title: You: ""Ouch.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ouch."

fields.Title: You: ""A pity.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A pity."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I shot and wounded him. While Glen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I shot and wounded him. While Glen took a bullet in the spine. It was meant for me -- he did not survive." There's a pause.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All." He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "All." He nods.

fields.Title: Endurance: "His smoking, his hunched back... yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His smoking, his hunched back... you have it worse, but he took a real beating. That cigarette has *medicinal* purposes.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As retaliation, their rifleman shot you. He hit. With his carabine -- I was looking for a clear line of sight. When I found it..."

fields.Title: You: ""If not my station, then who treate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If not my station, then who treated me?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay...." (Get up.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay...." (Get up.)

fields.Title: You: ""I'm very bad, Kim. Things are very..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm very bad, Kim. Things are very bad."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you -- teet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at you -- teetering on your feet.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Sunrise, parabellum*," the lieute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Sunrise, parabellum*," the lieutenant says. He's in the middle of a freshly cleaned room, with the fan above his head like a halo. His face is covered in bruises.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the *dangero..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I think the *dangerous* theory you presented on Klaasje was wrong. We have not found a motive, or a weapon for her."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't know. I think the *dangerous* theory you presented on Klaasje -- or whatever her name is -- was wrong. We have not found a motive, or a weapon for her."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't be narcissistic. Half the co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't be narcissistic. Half the cops in Revachol West are his *peones*. Even if you are, it is not a decisive factor in this case."

fields.Title: You: ""There are all these... old bunkers..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are all these... old bunkers and weapon caches around..."
fields.Alternate1: "There are all these... old bunkers and weapon caches. Revolutionary era!"
fields.Alternate2: "There was that... hidden bunker under the boardwalk. Revolutionary era!"
fields.Alternate3: "There was that... hidden weapons cache under the building. Revolutionary era!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It can feel that way sometimes, ye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It can feel that way sometimes, yes."

fields.Title: You: ""Are you sure? I see communism *eve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you sure? I see communism *everywhere*, telling us what to think, stifling... ouch, my *leg hurts*!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I am glad that you do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am glad that you do."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Actually, you *can*. You can even r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, you *can*. You can even remove a fractured bullet, it seems...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see the drouamine is working.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see the drouamine is working."

fields.Title: You: ""My gun. It's engraved on it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "My gun. It's engraved on it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You shot the major..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened? You shot the major in the face. A firefight ensued."

fields.Title: You: ""What happens now, Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happens now, Kim?"

fields.Title: You: ""Are you hurt?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you hurt?"

fields.Title: You: ""I feel fantastic. Let's... rock.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I feel fantastic. Let's... rock."

fields.Title: You: ""An antique bullet... from a Belle-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An antique bullet... from a Belle-Magrave, 4.46 mm. How hard can it be to find one? How hard can it *be*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think so." There's a short..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think so." There's a short pause. "Are you ready to limp?"

fields.Title: Drama: "He is definitely not on La Puta Mad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is definitely not on La Puta Madre's take.

fields.Title: You: ""Communism is making a *massive* co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Communism is making a *massive* comeback, Kim."

fields.Title: You: ""Good. It's good it's dead. Communi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. It's good it's dead. Communism is *stupid*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her end... Either way, Ruby's gone. And Klaasje -- well, at least *she's* safely locked away."
fields.Alternate1: "It's a little late to elicit her support now. Ruby's gone. And Klaasje -- well, at least she's safely locked away."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not..." He extinguishes the ci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not..." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.
fields.Sequence: ShowActualHeld();PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, StopSmoking); SetTriggerAnimation(Kim Cigarette, StopSmoking)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant does not answer, ins..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant does not answer, instead searching his coat pockets for something.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Who did it then, Kim? Who killed t..."]
You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

fields.Title: You: ""Good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good."

fields.Title: You: ""You misunderstand me. (cough) I me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You misunderstand me. (cough) I meant that in a... *disco* way."

fields.Title: You: ""And they're all dead, all three......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "And they're all dead, all three... of the contractors?"
fields.Alternate1: "And they're dead... the rest of the mercenaries?"

fields.Title: You: ""So you also killed.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you also killed."

fields.Title: You: ""Thank you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you."

fields.Title: You: ""Odd. You haven't seen any, have yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Odd. You haven't seen any, have you?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Sorry."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sorry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he repeats."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay," he repeats.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm just gonna say nothing...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm just gonna say nothing..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ideology does not have anything to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ideology does not have anything to do with the murder investigation at hand, I'm sorry -- it does not."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "A man of his word, this killer of k..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A man of his word, this killer of killers.

fields.Title: You: ""You think she could.... be of more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You think she could.... be of more use to us?"

fields.Title: You: ""I thought you only smoked one a da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought you only smoked one a day."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: You: ""Titus is dead?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus is dead?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Reasonably bad. You were shot in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reasonably bad. You were shot in the left quadriceps -- that's your thigh. It appears no major arteries were nicked. The bullet was removed and a bacterial infection treated with mercurochrome."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pretty bad, officer. You've suffer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pretty bad, officer. You've suffered two wounds. The first is below your shoulder. The bullet passed through your shoulder blade, luckily missing your lung -- and heart."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think the theory y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I think the theory you presented -- it being Ruby -- did not add up. If we ever find her, we can pursue her on many offences, but not this one."
fields.Alternate1: "I don't know. I think the theory you presented -- on Ruby -- does not add up. If she wasn't on her way to the morgue we could pursue her on many offences -- but not this one."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We could find thousands more if we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We could find thousands more if we wanted. All of Revachol is full of them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm ready to hear what you think a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm ready to hear what you think about solving crimes now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you ready to limp?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you ready to limp?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something," he repeats. It does no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something," he repeats. It does not sound like he's enthused about this *some-thing*.

fields.Title: You: ""You don't think it was a good idea?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You don't think it was a good idea?"

fields.Title: You: ""We should check Klaasje's room, up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should check Klaasje's room, upstairs."
fields.Alternate1: "We should check Mrs. Katarzine Alasije's room, upstairs."
fields.Alternate2: "We should check Miss Oranje Disco Dancer's room, upstairs."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I. Let's walk and hope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither do I. Let's walk and hope something happens, before you bleed to death. Klaasje's room is nearby..." He looks to the door.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Thank you."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank you.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait. You've checked? She's really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait. You've checked? She's really..."

fields.Title: Volition: "Who would have figured?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who would have figured?

fields.Title: Volition: "See? There's that. You can do balli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See? There's that. You can do ballistics!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman tri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As retaliation, their rifleman tried shooting you. He missed -- or you dodged..."

fields.Title: You: ""Is he dead?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is he dead?"

fields.Title: You: ""Why?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why?"

fields.Title: You: ""I don't see how it could have gone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't see how it could have gone any better."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? Because, to me, it seems s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Really? Because, to me, it seems solving crimes is *hard*."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Yes. I can see how it's hard..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Yes. I can see how it's hard to indict someone who is not actually a person."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then I shot and wounded him while..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then I shot and wounded him while Glen took a bullet in the spine." He nods. "It was meant for me. Glen did not survive." There's a pause.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer," he says c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's face it, officer," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. You could've *not* missed."

fields.Title: Half Light: "He was afraid."
fields.Dialogue Text: He was afraid.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "It's nothing. You're alive, that's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's nothing. You're alive, that's what matters.

fields.Title: You: ""What about the hole in the... ouch..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about the hole in the... ouch... wall? Someone was checking her out."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's wrong!"
fields.Dialogue Text: He's wrong!

fields.Title: Volition: "That's right."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's right.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pity?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pity?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cops like it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cops like it."
fields.Alternate1: "It served you well."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""De Paule was the last to die." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "De Paule was the last to die." He nods. "Evrart had their bodies returned to Krenel for a funeral. The company is yet to retaliate."
fields.Alternate1: He nods. "Evrart had their bodies returned to Krenel for a funeral. The company is yet to retaliate."

fields.Title: You: ""Eugene?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eugene?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""As retaliation, their rifleman tri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As retaliation, their rifleman tried shooting you. He hit the cuirass... I heard it go off. I was looking for a clear line of sight to him."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not answer, and searches fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not answer, and searches for something in his coat pocket instead.

fields.Title: Half Light: "There is unveiled anger in his voic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is unveiled anger in his voice.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

fields.Title: You: ""Can I... walk?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can I... walk?"

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "You won't be able to dance much, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You won't be able to dance much, that's for sure. You should be able to live with limping around though.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I did.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I did."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That means he hasn't seen them arou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That means he hasn't seen them around while you were out. They're not *really* worried about you. If they were, wouldn't they be here?

fields.Title: You: ""The miracle hasn't happened yet. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The miracle hasn't happened yet. It's not over yet."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should go upstairs, rethink the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should go upstairs, rethink the ballistics *in situ*." A light nod, through some pain. "I agree with this. What else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we may not be able to l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid we may not be able to locate communism, detective -- on account of it being dead."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know what to think. It mig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know what to think. It might not have been a *bad* idea. There is a *pin* somewhere in the machine. Something is keeping Krenel from sending in a death squad..." He looks out the window.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That you did." The lieutenant look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That you did." The lieutenant looks at you with a peculiar expression. He then continues...

fields.Title: Empathy: "This is not the first person to die..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not the first person to die in his place. He goes on.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Turns out it was a bad idea not to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Turns out it was a bad idea not to arrest her, but..." He shrugs. "Maybe it was a *good deed* that will pay off in heaven."

fields.Title: You: ""The room... it's clean.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The room... it's clean."

fields.Title: You: ""How long have I been out?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long have I been out?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."
fields.Alternate1: "Very. He died in the hospital."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A bloodstained killer."
fields.Dialogue Text: A bloodstained killer.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're an officer of the RCM." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're an officer of the RCM." He continues without waiting for a reply...

fields.Title: You: ""How many casualties... on the Unio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "How many casualties... on the Union's side? Total?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Because we *deterred* them? Or Joy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Because we *deterred* them? Or Joyce did? Maybe the harbour -- in full lockdown -- is too costly a target. Or maybe..." he breathes in the fumes, thinking.

fields.Title: You: ""And the major...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And the major..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And..." he smiles: "We are still a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And..." he smiles: "We are still alive -- both of us."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will see.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We will see."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: You: ""I didn't know you could... do that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I didn't know you could... do that."

fields.Title: You: ""Isn't that... strange?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Isn't that... strange?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither do I. Let's walk and hope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither do I. Let's walk and hope something happens before you bleed to death. Klaasje's room is nearby..." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.
fields.Sequence: ShowActualHeld();PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, StopSmoking); SetTriggerAnimation(Kim Cigarette, StopSmoking)

fields.Title: You: ""Ouch.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The piss-jacket, Kim... you took it off?"

fields.Title: You: ""Wait! *Klaasje* is gone too?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait! *Klaasje* is gone too?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sunrise, Parabellum. Sunrise, Prep..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sunrise, Parabellum. Sunrise, Prepare-for-War. It's an old revolutionary saying."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh no, officer," he says calmly --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh no, officer," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It's pretty bad. Six people are dead."
fields.Alternate1: "Oh no, officer," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It's pretty bad. Seven people are dead."
fields.Alternate2: "Oh no, Harry," he says calmly -- without accusation. "It's pretty bad. Seven people are dead."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You shot the major...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened? You shot the major. Unsuccessfully. A firefight ensued."
fields.Alternate1: "What happened? You shot the colonel -- unsuccessfully. Then you threw your gun at him. A firefight ensued."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were bleeding out by then..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were bleeding out by then..." He thinks. "You warned me -- I was able to disarm Kortenaer before he got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate1: "You were bleeding out. I think you said something about your wife... And you *warned* me. I was able to disarm the major before he got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate2: "You were bleeding out. I think you said no one wants to party with you. And you *warned* me. I was able to disarm the major before he got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate3: "You were bleeding out. I think you said you lied about being an amnesiac. And you *warned* me. I was able to disarm the major before he got the jump on me."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""But what's done is done. The viole..."]
Endurance: "With considerable pain and the stit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With considerable pain and the stitches tearing every now and then -- you should be able to do it.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You can take it. Just don't lean on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can take it. Just don't lean on that leg of yours too heavily.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Physical Instrument: "He thinks you should sit back down...."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, she left yesterday morning. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, she left yesterday morning. To meet the board of Wild Pines -- or that is what I've heard. There's a *pin* somewhere in the machine that keeps Krenel from sending in a death squad..." He looks out the window.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That was our job to find out, wasn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was our job to find out, wasn't it? Honestly, I just don't know. Our circle of suspects is dead and gone. It's not a circle at all. It's a ruin."

fields.Title: You: ""You know what I think about... sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know what I think about... solving crimes?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""I'm ready." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm ready." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I want to talk about thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I want to talk about this crime some more, before I tell you what I think about its hardness."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "That concussion must be making him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That concussion must be making him dizzy.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's just aimlessly wander until..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's just aimlessly wander until a clue presents itself."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, so once more -- Klaasje has..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, so once more -- Klaasje has *escaped*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I killed her," the lieutenant repe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I killed her," the lieutenant repeats himself. "And that's what happened."
fields.Alternate1: "I was not able to kill him -- as I should have. Krenel took him..." the lieutenant states again. "A stray bullet killed de Paule, though. And that's what happened."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Garte cleaned it. It took him..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Garte cleaned it. It took him an entire day."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cool.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cool."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. We have also completely faile..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. We have also completely failed. But that's okay."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Isn't that written on your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Isn't that written on your...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the one.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the one."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, officer," he says calmly. "Si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, officer," he says calmly. "Six people are dead. It's not a success."
fields.Alternate1: "Yes, officer," he says calmly. "Seven people are dead. It's not a success."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I called your station after the fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I called your station after the fight. The injury was logged in. They told me they've sent officers to join you on the site."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't talk to Evrart, the harbo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. And Joyce has left too."
fields.Alternate1: "We can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. Joyce has left too, thanks to our meddling."
fields.Alternate2: "We can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. Joyce has left too, we never got to know what she would have told us. I'm sure it was important."
fields.Alternate3: "We can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. We never even met the Wild Pines representative, and she's gone too..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's extremely easy. There are tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's extremely easy. There are thousands lying around from the war. All completely unusable. It's precisely how *easy* it is that makes that bullet useless."
fields.Alternate1: "It's *extremely* easy. There are thousands lying around, *we* found one. All completely unusable. It's precisely how easy it is to find one that makes the bullet useless."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." There's a pause. "Where do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." There's a pause. "Where do you want to limp to?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," he concedes -- clearly not..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay," he concedes -- clearly not meaning it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's do that." He looks to the ce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's do that." He looks to the ceiling. Then the door. "Actually, I'm too tired to walk. Klaasje's room is nearby."
fields.Alternate1: "Let's do that. We can start upstairs in Klaasje's bedroom -- the ballistics idea..." He sighs.
fields.Alternate2: "Let's do that. We can start upstairs in Klaasje's bedroom -- I have not done a thorough sweep after she left..." He sighs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I know you did. It's all right.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I know you did. It's all right."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She never had a chance. She should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She never had a chance. She should not have been there in the first place. There was no way to *convince* them."
The close proximity of death must have made the lieutenant contemplate his life choices. He's *done* with the jacket.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "That's between you and them, he thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's between you and them, he thinks.

fields.Title: You: ""What... happened?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What... happened?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Drouamine. Then it's not *that* bad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drouamine. Then it's not *that* bad. Neither surgical, nor organ-damage bad. But still under-the-counter bad.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were bleeding out, you said so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were bleeding out, you said something, I don't know what..." He thinks. "And you warned me. I was able to disarm officer de Paule before she got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate1: "You were bleeding out by then. I think you said something about your wife. And you warned me. I was able to disarm one of them, de Paule, before she got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate2: "You were bleeding out by then. I think you said that no one wants to party with you. And you warned me. I was able to disarm one of them, de Paule, before she got the jump on me."
fields.Alternate3: "You were bleeding out by then. I think you said you lied about being an amnesiac. And you warned me. I was able to disarm one of them, de Paule, before she got the jump on me."

fields.Title: You: ""Not *that* bad -- all things consi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not *that* bad -- all things considered."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But what's done is done. The viole..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But what's done is done. The violence is cordoned off, the mercenary tribunal is neutralized. The worst scenario has not materialized -- yet."
fields.Alternate1: "But what's done is done. The violence is cordoned off, the hornets did not get into the beehive." He rubs his swollen chin. "The worst scenario has not materialized -- yet."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. He's still alive too.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. He's still alive too."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not very." He rubs his chin. "I ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not very." He rubs his chin. "I have a concussion from that woman beating me with the butt of her gun... I try to not move too much."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not very." He rubs his chin. "I ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not very." He rubs his chin. "I have a concussion from the major beating me with the butt of his gun. I try to not move too much."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Easy now..." The lieutenant turns..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy now..." The lieutenant turns double again, before your eyes. An orange hue of pain...

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "He thinks you should sit back down...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks you should sit back down. Back straight, now... you're not sitting ANYWHERE.

fields.Title: You: ""Good, because I totally do.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good, because I totally do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe it's her? Maybe she kept her end. Either way, Ruby's gone. And Klaasje too. We really should have arrested her, you know."
fields.Alternate1: "It's a little late to elicit her support now. Ruby's gone. And Klaasje too. We really should have arrested her, you know."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He pulls on his cigarette in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He pulls on his cigarette intently.

fields.Title: You: ""Something is creeping around out t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Something is creeping around out there. I sense it."

fields.Title: You: ""The god damn footprints!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The god damn footprints!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm listening.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm listening."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It really is *very* hard.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It really is *very* hard."

fields.Title: You: ""You're not ready to give up, are y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not ready to give up, are you?"

fields.Title: You: "(Yank it out and show the dried flo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Yank it out and show the dried flower, while it falls to pieces.) "This one, remember?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to be melodramatic.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need to be melodramatic."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not know what to reply. Loo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He does not know what to reply. Looks out of the window, then back at you.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do it *properly*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's do that." He extinguishes th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's do that." He extinguishes the cigarette on the sole of his boot.
fields.Sequence: ShowActualHeld();PlayAnimation(Kim Kitsuragi, StopSmoking); SetTriggerAnimation(Kim Cigarette, StopSmoking)
fields.Alternate1: "Let's do that. We can start upstairs in Klaasje's bedroom -- with your ballistics idea." He extinguishes his cigarette on the sole of his boot.
fields.Alternate2: "Let's do that. We can start upstairs in Klaasje's bedroom -- I have not done a thorough sweep after she left." He extinguishes his cigarette on the sole of his boot.

fields.Title: You: ""I warned them I am a killer of kil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I warned them I am a killer of killers..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Garte confirmed she left 20 minute..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Garte confirmed she left 20 minutes prior to the tribunal showing up."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Plus one. Ruby."
fields.Dialogue Text: Plus one. Ruby.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Six: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Six: Glen, Theo, Shanky, Angus. The fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause. "And Titus."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The gates of the harbour are board..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The gates of the harbour are boarded up. The streets are a little more empty. Apocalyptic violence is yet to erupt, I am relieved to say." He looks out the window.

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. I take it back.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. I take it back."

fields.Title: You: ""And that's..." (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "And that's..." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's face it, officer..." he says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's face it, officer..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. The diplomatic approach was terrible. It was my mistake. I should have attacked..."
fields.Alternate1: "Let's face it, officer..." he says calmly -- without accusation. "It could have gone a little better. You could have been *armed*. It was my mistake too, I should have attacked..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Reasonably bad. You were shot in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Reasonably bad. You were shot in the left quadriceps -- that's your thigh. The outer side thankfully, no major arteries were nicked. The bullet was removed and a bacterial infection treated with mercurochrome."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How are you?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How are you?"

fields.Title: You: ""Who cares. Who cares about me. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who cares. Who cares about me. It doesn't matter."

fields.Title: You: ""But... I don't know either.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But... I don't know either."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "But they seemed so mysterious."
fields.Dialogue Text: But they seemed so mysterious.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Joyce Messier. On the boat, y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Joyce Messier. On the boat, you know? She could have helped us. It's clear the mercenaries were working for Wild Pines. At least partially..." He looks out the window.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Locked up? No, she would be of mor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Locked up? No, she would be of more *use* to us free, honestly. But it was the right thing to do."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Thank you. Although..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank you. Although...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Absolutely," he nods. "There's no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolutely," he nods. "There's no other way to go about it. We screwed up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Every piece of garbage in the city..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Every piece of garbage in the city is not connected to the case. You don't have to keep *everything*."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "It's morning outside, you think."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's morning outside, you think.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Five: Glen, Theo, Shanky, and Angus, the fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uhuh," he nods. "I see the drouami..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uhuh," he nods. "I see the drouamine is working."

fields.Title: You: ""She did not make it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "She did not make it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... is in a private hospital acros..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... is in a private hospital across the river. Krenel claimed him from the local butcher shop, where Titus died. Turns out he's *insured*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The second shot hit you in the thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The second shot hit you in the thigh -- the left quadriceps." He points to your leg. "No major arteries were nicked, but the bullet had to be removed. A bacterial infection was treated with mercurochrome."

fields.Title: You: ""They don't care about me at all.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "They don't care about me at all."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Things would be much worse if you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things would be much worse if you didn't warn me." There's a pause. "Thank you. I did not see him coming. Stupid of me..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm alive...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm alive..."

fields.Title: You: ""Titus is *dead*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Titus is *dead*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He says. "God curse the foot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He says. "God curse the footprints -- not solving the case for us. *Au diable*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""Okay.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay."

fields.Title: IsTaskActive("TASK.find_some_moralists")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_sunday_friend")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.form_a_committee")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_trant")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.ask_smoker_about_sunday_friend")  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_cabin_accessed"] == false

IsTaskActive("TASK.find_some_moralists")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_sunday_friend")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.form_a_committee")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_trant")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.ask_smoker_about_sunday_friend")  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_cabin_accessed"] == false

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsTaskActive("TASK.find_some_moralists")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_sunday_friend")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.form_a_committee")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_trant")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.ask_smoker_about_sunday_friend")  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_cabin_accessed"] == false

fields.Title: !(IsTaskActive("TASK.find_some_moralists")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_sunday_friend")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.form_a_committee")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_trant")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.ask_smoker_about_sunday_friend")  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_cabin_accessed"] == false)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (IsTaskActive("TASK.find_some_moralists")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_sunday_friend")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.form_a_committee")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.talk_moralism_with_trant")  or  IsTaskActive("TASK.ask_smoker_about_sunday_friend")  or  Variable["jam.abandoned_cabin_accessed"] == false) == false

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's made his peace with it. He's h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's made his peace with it. He's had the time to do so.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a psycholocomotor.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a psycholocomotor."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Things would be worse if you didn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Things would be worse if you didn't warn me." There's a pause. "Thank you. I did not see her coming. Stupid of me..."

fields.Title: You: "Better not agitate yourself further..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Better not agitate yourself further, it already hurts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You see the lieutenant's familiar s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see the lieutenant's familiar shape in the orange jacket. It turns double -- then triple -- from the pain.

fields.Title: You: ""Joyce is gone?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Joyce is gone?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you? Because we can't talk to E..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you? Because we can't talk to Evrart, the harbour is in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. And Joyce has left too."
fields.Alternate1: "Do you? Because we can't talk to Evrart, the harbour's in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. Joyce has left too, thanks to our meddling."
fields.Alternate2: "Do you? Because we can't talk to Evrart, the harbour's in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. Joyce has left too; we never got to know what she would have told us."
fields.Alternate3: "Do you? Because we can't talk to Evrart, the harbour's in lockdown -- everyone in there is outside our grasp now. The Wild Pines representative has left too, and we never even met her..."

fields.Title: You: ""Solving crimes is almost impossibl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Solving crimes is almost impossible."

fields.Title: You: ""It's not *whether* I am -- I am. J..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not *whether* I am -- I am. Jules told me so, he's from my station."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've heard people say *I* am on La..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've heard people say *I* am on La Puta Madre's take." He looks you in the eye. "And I am *not*."

fields.Title: You: ""If I would have presented the theo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I would have presented the theory better... to their leader..."

fields.Title: Volition: "Stop this line of thought now. You'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop this line of thought now. You're too broken for ghosts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: A nod.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Another look at the window perhaps..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Another look at the window perhaps -- the one he was shot through? I don't know... I can't think of anything better."

fields.Title: You: ""Ouch.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ouch."

fields.Title: You: ""Pity all the whores and traitors h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pity all the whores and traitors haven't been washed away! It's like I suffer... (cough) but for what?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right." He nods in agreemen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right." He nods in agreement. "Ouch, indeed."

fields.Title: You: ""What... happened then?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What... happened then?"

fields.Title: You: ""I dodged.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I dodged."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four: Glen, Theo, Angus, the fat o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four: Glen, Theo, Angus, the fat one, he... took a lot of bullets." There's a pause.

fields.Title: You: ""An absolute disaster.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "An absolute disaster."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened? You threw an improv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened? You threw an improvised petroleum bomb at the major. A firefight ensued."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You tried to throw an improvised p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You tried to throw an improvised petroleum bomb. It missed. Then you said *it's a fiasco, bratan* in a funny voice. A firefight ensued."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No. They would be here if they were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. They would be here if they were truly worried.

fields.Title: You: ""Gnhhhh...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gnhhhh..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I honestly don't know.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I honestly don't know."

fields.Title: You: ""This is because I'm a La Puta Madr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is because I'm a La Puta Madre's peone, isn't it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. I think your *incred..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. I think your *incredibly dangerous* theory about *you* being the killer was incorrect, however. There is not one piece of evidence to support it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A gust of wind blows in from the ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A gust of wind blows in from the bay, the duraluminium box around you vibrates imperceptibly... a familiar cold, a red thread on the roof upstairs. Taut. Plucked like a string by the gust.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not?" He looks to the ceiling,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why not?" He looks to the ceiling, then to the door.
